DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare safety pharmacokinetic characteristic administration HIP1503 HGP1103 healthy male volunteer .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Pharmacokinetic Characteristics After Administration HIP1503 HGP1103 Healthy Male Volunteers
DOC.criteria: 1 . Healthy male volunteer , age 19 45 year . 2 . The result Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 17.5 kg/m2~ 30.5 kg/m2 , body weight 55kg . 3 . Subjects ability comprehend objective , content study property study drug participate trial willingness sign inform consent writing . 1 . Presence medical history concurrent disease , include clinically significant disorder kidney , liver , cardiovascular system , respiratory system , endocrine system , neuropsychiatric system . 2 . Medical history Gastrointestinal Diseases effect drug absorption ( esophageal disease , chronic disease ) surgery ( except appendectomy , herniolaparotomy ) 3. sit SBP > 140 mmHg , sit DBP > 90 mmHg 4 . Alcohol Drug abuse within 1 year
